00040 bool TestSource::next(ByteString &key, ByteString &value) {
00041   string line;
00042   boost::shared_array<char> linePtr;
00043   char *base, *ptr, *last;
00044   char *rowKey;
00045   char *column;
00046   char *value_str;
00047   uint64_t timestamp;
00048 
00049   while (getline(m_fin, line)) {
00050     m_cur_line++;
00051 
00052     boost::trim(line);
00053 
00054     linePtr.reset(new char [ strlen(line.c_str()) + 1 ]);
00055     base = linePtr.get();
00056     strcpy(base, line.c_str());
00057 
00058     if ((ptr = strtok_r(base, "\t", &last)) == 0) {
00059       cerr << "Mal-formed input on line " << (m_cur_line-1) << endl;
00060       continue;
00061     }
00062 
00063     if (!strcasecmp(ptr, "AUTO")) {
00064       timestamp = 0;
00065     }
00066     else {
00067       timestamp = strtoll(ptr, 0, 0);
00068       if (timestamp == 0 && errno == EINVAL) {
00069         cerr << "Invalid timestamp (" << ptr << ") on line " << (m_cur_line-1) << endl;
00070         continue;
00071       }
00072       if (m_min_timestamp == 0 || timestamp < m_min_timestamp)
00073         m_min_timestamp = timestamp;
00074     }
00075 
00076     if ((rowKey = strtok_r(0, "\t", &last)) == 0) {
00077       cerr << "Mal-formed input on line " << (m_cur_line-1) << endl;
00078       continue;
00079     }
00080 
00084     size_t row_key_len = strlen(rowKey);
00085     if (row_key_len >= 2) {
00086       if (!strcmp(&rowKey[row_key_len-2], "??")) {
00087         rowKey[row_key_len-1] = (char )0xff;
00088         rowKey[row_key_len-2] = (char )0xff;
00089       }
00090     }
00091 
00092     if ((column = strtok_r(0, "\t", &last)) == 0) {
00093       cerr << "Mal-formed input on line " << (m_cur_line-1) << endl;
00094       continue;
00095     }
00096 
00097     if (!strcmp(column, "DELETE")) {
00098       if (!create_row_delete(rowKey, timestamp, key, value)) {
00099         cerr << "Mal-formed input on line " << (m_cur_line-1) << endl;
00100         continue;
00101       }
00102       return true;
00103     }
00104 
00105     if ((value_str = strtok_r(0, "\t", &last)) == 0)
00106       value_str = "";
00107 
00108     if (!strcmp(value_str, "DELETE")) {
00109       if (!create_column_delete(rowKey, column, timestamp, key, value)) {
00110         cerr << "Mal-formed input on line " << (m_cur_line-1) << endl;
00111         continue;
00112       }
00113       return true;
00114     }
00115 
00116     row_key_len = strlen(value_str);
00117     if (row_key_len >= 2) {
00118       if (!strcmp(&value_str[row_key_len-2], "??")) {
00119         value_str[row_key_len-1] = (char )0xff;
00120         value_str[row_key_len-2] = (char )0xff;
00121         cerr << "converting end of value (" << value_str << ")" << endl;
00122       }
00123     }
00124 
00125     if (!create_insert(rowKey, column, timestamp, value_str, key, value)) {
00126       cerr << "Mal-formed input on line " << (m_cur_line-1) << endl;
00127       continue;
00128     }
00129 
00130     return true;
00131   }
00132 
00133   return false;
00134 }

00137 bool TestSource::create_row_delete(const char *row, uint64_t timestamp, ByteString &key, ByteString &value) {
00138   int32_t keyLen = strlen(row) + 12;
00139 
00140   m_key_buffer.clear();
00141   m_key_buffer.ensure(sizeof(int32_t)+keyLen);
00142 
00143   Serialization::encode_vi32(&m_key_buffer.ptr, keyLen);
00144   m_key_buffer.addNoCheck(row, strlen(row)+1);
00145   *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = 0;
00146   *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = 0;
00147   *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = FLAG_DELETE_ROW;
00148   Key::encode_ts64(&m_key_buffer.ptr, timestamp);
00149 
00150   key.ptr = m_key_buffer.base;
00151 
00152   m_value_buffer.clear();
00153   append_as_byte_string(m_value_buffer, 0, 0);
00154   value.ptr = m_value_buffer.base;
00155   return true;
00156 }

00159 bool TestSource::create_column_delete(const char *row, const char *column, uint64_t timestamp, ByteString &key, ByteString &value) {
00160   int32_t keyLen = 0;
00161   string columnFamily;
00162   const char *qualifier;
00163   const char *ptr = strchr(column, ':');
00164   
00165   if (ptr == 0) {
00166     cerr << "Bad column family specifier (no family)" << endl;
00167     return false;
00168   }
00169 
00170   columnFamily = string(column, ptr-column);
00171   qualifier = ptr+1;
00172 
00173   Schema::ColumnFamily *cf = m_schema->get_column_family(columnFamily);
00174   if (cf == 0) {
00175     cerr << "Column family '" << columnFamily << "' not found in schema" << endl;
00176     return false;
00177   }
00178 
00179   m_key_buffer.clear();
00180   keyLen = strlen(row) + strlen(qualifier) + 12;
00181   m_key_buffer.ensure(sizeof(int32_t)+keyLen);
00182 
00183   Serialization::encode_vi32(&m_key_buffer.ptr, keyLen);
00184   m_key_buffer.addNoCheck(row, strlen(row)+1);
00185   *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = cf->id;
00186   m_key_buffer.addNoCheck(qualifier, strlen(qualifier)+1);
00187   *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = FLAG_DELETE_CELL;
00188   Key::encode_ts64(&m_key_buffer.ptr, timestamp);
00189 
00190   key.ptr = m_key_buffer.base;
00191 
00192   m_value_buffer.clear();
00193   append_as_byte_string(m_value_buffer, 0, 0);
00194   value.ptr = m_value_buffer.base;
00195   return true;
00196 }

00199 bool TestSource::create_insert(const char *row, const char *column, uint64_t timestamp, const char *value_str, ByteString &key, ByteString &value) {
00200   int32_t keyLen = 0;
00201   string columnFamily;
00202   const char *qualifier;
00203   const char *ptr = strchr(column, ':');
00204   
00205   if (ptr == 0) {
00206     cerr << "Bad column family specifier (no family)" << endl;
00207     return false;
00208   }
00209 
00210   columnFamily = string(column, ptr-column);
00211   qualifier = ptr+1;
00212 
00213   Schema::ColumnFamily *cf = m_schema->get_column_family(columnFamily);
00214   if (cf == 0) {
00215     cerr << "Column family '" << columnFamily << "' not found in schema" << endl;
00216     return false;
00217   }
00218 
00219   m_key_buffer.clear();
00220   keyLen = strlen(row) + strlen(qualifier) + 12;
00221   m_key_buffer.ensure(keyLen+sizeof(int32_t));
00222 
00223   Serialization::encode_vi32(&m_key_buffer.ptr, keyLen);
00224   m_key_buffer.addNoCheck(row, strlen(row)+1);
00225   *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = cf->id;
00226   m_key_buffer.addNoCheck(qualifier, strlen(qualifier)+1);
00227   *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = FLAG_INSERT;
00228   Key::encode_ts64(&m_key_buffer.ptr, timestamp);
00229 
00230   key.ptr = m_key_buffer.base;
00231 
00232   m_value_buffer.clear();
00233   append_as_byte_string(m_value_buffer, value_str, strlen(value_str));
00234   value.ptr = m_value_buffer.base;
00235   return true;
00236 }
